trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_SEQ_00<tab>Zlatan is ready to see you on your way. ※Changing classes or jobs will prevent progress during this quest.

TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_SEQ_01<tab>You consult Zlatan about what manner of memory would be ideal to further enhance your Resistance weapon, and he suggests those that come from battles of great peril, such as one might expect in a large-scale assault. He is confident fifteen such memories will suffice. Where they should be collected, however, he leaves to your judgment.
※You may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest. ※Loathsome memories of the dying can be obtained by participating in critical engagements on the southern front, or by completing Crystal Tower alliance raids.

TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_SEQ_02<tab>Gerolt has readied his forge for your return, and he is quick to begin working when you hand him the memories. With his customary flourishes of clanging and banging, your Resistance weapon is given new form, the energies emanating from it nearly palpable. Though he is quite satisfied with his work, he believes there is yet room for improvement. It is his hope inspiration will strike again before you next call on his services.

TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_TODO_00<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((Obtain loathsome memories of the dying)) ((With <var 08 E4E80514 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 03F278410202 /var> and <var 31 ((Item)) 03F278520202 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80515 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 03F278420202 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80516 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 03F278430202 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80517 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 03F278440202 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80518 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 03F278450202 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80519 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 03F278490202 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8051A ((<var 31 ((Item)) 03F2784A0202 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8051C ((<var 31 ((Item)) 03F2784B0202 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8051D ((<var 31 ((Item)) 03F2784C0202 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8051F ((<var 31 ((Item)) 03F278460202 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80520 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 03F278480202 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80521 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 03F278470202 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80522 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 03F2784D0202 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80523 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 03F2784E0202 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80524 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 03F2784F0202 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80526 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 03F278500202 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80527 ((<var 31 ((Item)) 03F278510202 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var> in your inventory or Armoury Chest, deliver the loathsome memories of the dying to Zlatan at Gangos)) /var>.

TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_SYSTEM_800_000<tab>Please note that upon completing the quest “Change of Arms,” you will receive a Resistance weapon for <var 08 E4E9450B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9450F ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94506 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9451B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94522 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((a <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_SYSTEM_801_000<tab>Please ensure you have changed to your desired job before speaking with Zlatan.
TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_Q1_800_000<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_A1_800_000<tab>Undertake this quest as another job.

TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_A2_800_000<tab>Undertake this quest as <var 08 E4E9450B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9450F ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94506 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9451B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94522 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((a <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_SYSTEM_800_001<tab>Please speak with Zlatan again when you are ready to undertake this quest.

TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_SYSTEM_800_005<tab>You have already received <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var> and <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8030202 /var>. Please change to a different job and speak with Zlatan again.
TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_SYSTEM_800_006<tab>You have already received <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var>. Please change to a different job and speak with Zlatan again.

TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_SYSTEM_800_008<tab>In order to accept the quest “Change of Arms,” please ensure that <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var> and <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8030202 /var> are either equipped, in your Armoury Chest, or in your inventory.

TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_SYSTEM_800_009<tab>In order to accept the quest “Change of Arms,” please ensure that <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var> is either equipped, in your Armoury Chest, or in your inventory.
TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_ZLATAN_000_000<tab>Are you ready to seek out memories for your weapon? Excellent.
TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_ZLATAN_000_001<tab>We have come to the conclusion that those formed at a moment of great peril─such as some manner of large-scale assault─would best suit our purposes.

TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_ZLATAN_000_002<tab>Battles on the southern front will no doubt suffice, but I imagine a worldly adventurer such as yourself can think of other places to find them. If you can track down fifteen such memories, we should be well on our way to forging a new weapon for you.
TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_ZLATAN_000_010<tab>Come to refine another Resistance weapon, I presume? Then I will have Master Gerolt ready the forge.
TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_ZLATAN_000_011<tab>As before, the work will require another set of fifteen memories.
TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>Loathsome memories of the dying can be obtained by participating in critical engagements on the southern front.
TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>They may also be obtained by completing Crystal Tower alliance raids.

TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_ZLATAN_000_025<tab>With memories of sufficient intensity, we are quite certain no more than fifteen will be required for the task at hand. Where you choose to find them, be it on the southern front or elsewhere, I will leave to your judgment.
TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_SYSTEM_000_026<tab>Loathsome memories of the dying can be obtained by participating in critical engagements on the southern front.
TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_SYSTEM_000_027<tab>They may also be obtained by completing Crystal Tower alliance raids.
TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_ZLATAN_000_050<tab>Ah, you are returned. Before we begin, might I ask you to remove your weapon?
TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_ZLATAN_000_055<tab>Master Gerolt has readied the forge, along with all other requisite materials. May I have the memories you have collected?
TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_ZLATAN_000_060<tab>Wonderful. And the weapon, if you please.
TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_ZLATAN_000_061<tab>Very good. Master Gerolt will be delighted. Or whatever passes for delight in that ale-sodden mind of his.
TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_GEROLT_000_065<tab>Right, then. If these here memories are as potent as I think they are, this should make for interestin' work.
TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_GEROLT_000_070<tab>Lookin' to spruce up another Resistance weapon, are we? Well, can't rightly say no after ye went through the trouble o' gatherin' all these here memories.
TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_GEROLT_000_071<tab>Right, then. If these here memories are anythin' like the last bunch, this shouldn't take too long.

TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_GEROLT_000_080<tab>Seems the memories've taken to yer weapon well enough. And they've transformed it into a right fine piece of art. I call <var 08 E4E94515 (('em)) ((<var 08 E4E9451F (('em)) ((<var 08 E4E94527 (('em)) (('er)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>, <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var>!

TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_GEROLT_000_081<tab>Seems the memories've taken to yer weapon well enough. And they've transformed it into a right fine piece of art. I call 'er, <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var>!
TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_GEROLT_000_082<tab>'Course we can't forget 'er counterpart, <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var>!
TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_GEROLT_000_090<tab>Turns out the queen's inscriptions are more powerful than I gave 'em credit for. Wouldn't surprise me if they've a bit more untapped potential.

TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_ZLATAN_000_091<tab>You have outdone yourself once again, Master Gerolt! Why, it is almost enough to overlook your deplorable drinking habits. And you believe the weapon may be improved upon even further?

TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_GEROLT_000_092<tab>Can't say fer certain. Perhaps if, uh...if I were to take a little stroll about the camp─ye know, to clear me head an' such─might be as I'll be struck by inspiration.

TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_ZLATAN_000_093<tab>Did you not say the very same thing shortly after Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var> left to collect memories? As I recall, it was a very short stroll to the storehouse. Where you imbibed the entirety of our last keg of ale...

TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_ZLATAN_000_094<tab>No, I believe you've had enough <var 1A 02 /var>inspiration<var 1A 01 /var> for one day, Master Gerolt. Instead, I believe it behooves us to share your latest accomplishment with the others before promptly returning to work.
TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_GEROLT_000_095<tab>Hmph.

TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_GEROLT_000_096<tab><sigh> Not even a pint for all me efforts. Well, don't let us keep you. I'm sure you're itchin' to try that fancy new weapon o' yers. If afterward ye decide it still needs more work, come back and I'll see what I can do.
TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_ZLATAN_000_100<tab>As always, it is an honor and a privilege to see you work, Master Gerolt. It is quite clear there is still much for me to learn about the art of smithing.
TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_GEROLT_000_101<tab>Yer praise is appreciated, but what I need now ain't compliments, but mead. Or mayhaps if ye'd let me fix up a kettle or two fer a nice change o' pace...

TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_ZLATAN_000_102<tab>It is weapons the Resistance needs, Master Gerolt, not kettles. Surely, devising methods of improving the Resistance weapons would be a better use of your time?
TEXT_LUCKSA251_04038_ZLATAN_000_103<tab>Speaking of which, if you should find your weapon wants for refinement, do not hesitate to come and speak with me.
